Translations.Text: Zhe shi zhenzhu, nimen de zhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe, gu nimen dang chongbai ta. Ta shi wanwu de jianhu zhe.
Zhong mu bunengjian ta, ta que neng jian zhong mu. Ta shi jingming de, shi che zhi de.
Cong nimen de zhu fachu de xuduo mingzheng, yi jianglin nimen; shui zhongshi naxie mingzheng, shui zi shou qi yi; shui hushi naxie mingzheng, shui zi shou qi hai; wo bushi jianhu nimen de.
Wo zheyang chanshu yiqie jixiang, yibian tamen shuo ni ceng yanjiuguo jingdian, yibian wo wei you zhishi de minzhong chanming zhenli.
Ni dang zunshou ni de zhu suo qishi ni de jingdian; chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; ni dang bi kai yi wu pei zhu de ren.
Jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, tamen bi bu yi wu pei zhu. Wo meiyou yi ni wei tamen de baohu zhe, ni ye jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe.

Nimen buyao ruma tamen she zhenzhu er qidao de (ouxiang), yimian tamen yinguo fen he wuzhi er ruma zhenzhu. Wo zheyang yi mei ge minzu de xingwei mihuo tamen, ranhou, tamen zhi guiyu tamen de zhu, er ta yao ba tamen shengqian de xingwei gaosu tamen.

Tamen zhi zhenzhu er fachu zui yanzhong de mengshi, ruguo you yizhong jixiang jianglin tamen, namo, tamen biding quexin ta. Ni shuo:`Yiqie jixiang, zhi zai zhenzhu nali.'Nimen zenme zhidao ne? Dang jixiang jianglin de shihou, tamen huoxu buxin ta.
Wo yao fanzhuan tamen de xin he yan, shi tamen he chuci wei xin yiyang, wo jiang ren sui tamen pang huang zaiguo fen zhi zhong.
